title: Machines at Home
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 48 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 170L
description: In Machines at Home, students learn about some of the familiar machines used to help do everyday tasks around their homes. Early emergent readers are supported by high-frequency words, repetitive phrases, and detailed photographs. Students have the opportunity to locate details that support the main idea.
meta: blender, dry, freeze, machines, make, wash
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /m/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency word we

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
